channel.title: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?
channel.description: I've noticed while watching old BH vids that everybody hitted high more often.

item.title: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Damage soaking didn’t affect the accuracy formula

/facepalm

(and it didn’t affect ‘max hit’ either, you can still see the soaked damage)

Read full topic
item.source: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?

item.title: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:15, topic:461620"][quote author=SCFTW link=topic=564571.msg4111528#msg4111528 date=1348558921]
Damage soaking is one of the reasons.
[/quote]
Yes! Finally somebody remembers it.[/quote]
If you knew the answer, why did you ask the question :s

Read full topic
item.source: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?

item.title: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:6, topic:461620"][quote author=~icestorm~ link=topic=564571.msg4109694#msg4109694 date=1348413138]
You also need to remember the people making these videos spend weeks gather clips, and only want to show the best clips as in the ones with high hits.

It’s not like they hit like this often, it’s that they are only showing the times they got lucky and hit that high.
[/quote]
You don’t understand…I’ve pked myself back then. And I hit better than I do now…[/quote]
You’re moving away from all the pures that don’t train defense then.

Read full topic

item.title: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I remember seeing the announcement, but I cba to check 200(or more) pages of news on RS site.

I can tell you that the PKing nowadays sucks. To actually win someone you either have to:
1.Spend 200m+ for turmoil
2.Spend 200m for epic gear
3. Have shit tons of luck.

(Bit mad for losing 100m+ during 2 weeks to overpowered mages, korasi, rapiers, mauls, and finally…turmoil)

Read full topic
item.source: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?

item.source: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?

item.title: Has Jagex changed the accuracy formula?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I’ve got better gear and stats…and i dont hit that much and often. I’ve been PKing for past 2 weeks daily. I’m 100% sure they have changed it.

I’m not saying that it has been recently changed, but it has been changed during the past 4 years. I haven’t played actively as I said, so I don’t know when.

Also, I think they should release Bounty Hunter back. It was very fun.

Read full topic
